about_the_game:
Travel way, way back in time to the beginning of the gaming era with this fantastic set of resources that are reminiscent of old school gameboy RPGs.

Nostalgia Graphics Pack by Ocean’s Dream includes a huge selection of tiles, backdrops, battlebacks, battlers, animations, characters, basic system graphics, and enemies that are designed for various RPG settings. All assets come formatted in the classic-retro green colour scheme but also include grayscale and full colour versions as well.

As a bonus there are icons and super-vintage, chip tune style audio BGM resources and MIDI files that are also available for use and included in this pack.

Features:

All contents comes in three retro colors (full color, light green and grey)

* 11 animations: elemental attack (Fire, Water, ice etc.) as well as armour attack (ax, staff, sword etc.)
* 8 animation sprites: (Door, Chest, Ship etc.)
* 13 battlebacks (Castle, Field, Town, Underwater etc.)
* 56 Front-view battlers (Dark Knight, Dragon, Wizard etc.)
* Walking sprites (5 animals, 8 villans, 14 heroes, 8 NPC)
* TileA1, A2 (ground tiles, floor tiles, lava, waterfalls etc.)
* TileA4, A5 (castle tiles, wall tiles, cliff tiles etc.)
* TileB (Interior tiles for house / for science lab / for dungeon, exterior tiles like grass and flowers and more!)
* TileC (buildings, castles, church, farm etc.)
* TileD, E (tiles to create ship and a sample)
* Torch, flower and grass (animation)
* HP level graphic (11 levels), Number and Skit, ”Game Over” sign, 70 icons
* 16 Retro style BGM! (.ogg, .mp3, ,m4a and midi file included)

Music Tracklist:

1 - Battle
2 - Boss
3 - Calm
4 - Contest
5 - Crisis
6 - Dance
7 - Ending
8 - Fanfare
9 - Hurry
10 - Intro
11 - Leaving
12 - Loss
13 - Rush
14 - Sorrow
15 - Title
16 - Trials

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Nostalgia Graphics Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Nostalgia Graphics Pack are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Travel way, way back in time to the beginning of the gaming era with this fantastic set of resources that are reminiscent of old school gameboy RPGs. Nostalgia Graphics Pack by Ocean’s Dream includes a huge selection of tiles, backdrops, battlebacks, battlers, animations, characters, basic system graphics, and enemies that are designed for various RPG settings. All assets come formatted in the classic-retro green colour scheme but also include grayscale and full colour versions as well. As a bonus there are icons and super-vintage, chip tune style audio BGM resources and MIDI files that are also available for use and included in this pack. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
